Posts.Content: Sep 6, 2012 02:01PM - edited Sep 6, 2012 02:02PM by shizaf Interesting.  I am rereading posts after my excisional yesterday to get an understanding on a pain, swelling etc.  Mine was local and though I am glad to not have to deal with the side effects of anathesia etc, it was not a pleasant experience.  Lying still for 30 minutes while you feel your skin and tissue being tugged, hear noises, smell burning skin (hot knife) and see smoke is not pleasant.  I'm not sure if knowing this would have helped me prepare better or made me scared ...
Posts.Title: Excisional Biopsy jena FilterLady
